participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is determined and hardworking, with a deep love for nature and a strong sense of independence.
participant_1.background: i am a bee farmer. i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya.

participant_2.background: my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. my grandfather served in world war a.
